October 20, 196k
P
Mr. Lou Feneguy, Director
Coordination and Information
Alabama Educational Television Commission
2151 Highland Avenue
Birmingham, Alabama 35205
Dear Lou,
Thank you for your letter of October 14. I am referring it to Harold
Hill for a decision on whether or not the NAEB would like to go along
with your suggestion.
It was good to hear from you again.
Sincerely,
Marion Corwell
Associate Director
MC/hJk
